text:
Hi Marcus,

I hope you had a good Easter weekend. I am Diogo Teixeira, a 3rd Year student and studio assistant at Escape Studios. All my life I have always been fascinated by the effects done in film, watching things like Iron Man and Transformers. These films inspired me to study a film production course for GCSE and College. After doing a VFX module I had gotten hooked on the feeling of creating VFX and made this short for my final major project. I then moved to London to study at Escape studios in 2017. Here I made the decision to become a 2D VFX artist. Here is a link to my current showreel: <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=enVU0U1VvFc>. If you have any tips for my reel, I would love to hear them :blush:.

In my spare time, I like to play video games, watch films, cooking and hanging out with friends. It sounds quite basic but its really the only things I have time for besides studying and working. Do you have any hobbies and things that you would like to share?
